capability.name: Operational Risk Models
capability.definition: Operational Risk Models capability focuses on developing, maintaining, and refining models that detect potential operational failures and exposures. It provides comprehensive analysis of operational breaches and issues to ensure effective risk detection and mitigation.
capability.role: Develop and refine operational risk models to detect possible exposures to operational failures
capability.example: Financial engineers evaluate the history of operational breaches and issues to determine how well existing operational risk models cover the detection of exposures
